Name: Post Sortie Checkout
checklistText:
2.7 POST SORTIE CHECKOUT

a. 	Park LRV cross sun from the right in view of LM Windows. 
b. 	Hand controller in parking brake position, throttle in neutral
	SET BRAKE. 
c. 	Report BEARING, DISTANCE, and RANGE. 
d. 	Report BAT 1 and BAT 2 AMP-HR. 
e. 	Report BAT 1 and BAT 2 VOLTS. 
f. 	BATTERY Switch - AMPS. 
g. 	Report battery and drive motor temperatures.
h. 	DRIVE POWER Switches (4) - OFF. 
i. 	STEERING Switches (2) - OFF.
j. 	Â± 15 VDC Switch - OFF.
k. 	Nav Power Circuit Breaker - OPEN.
l. 	BUS A, BUS B, BUS C, BUS D Circuit Breakers - OPEN.
m. 	Crewman in right seat release and stow seat belts and egress LRV. 
n. 	Crewman in left seat release and stow seat belts and egress LRV. 
o. 	Align HGA. 
p. 	LCRU mode Switch - TV RMT. 
q. 	Open LRV Battery and SPU Dust Covers. 
r. 	Prior to LM Ingress - Perform the following:_ 
		LCRU Power Switch - OFF.
		Adjust LCRU Thermal Blankets per ground request.
